verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His name, His blessed name shall be called Wonderful. His name, His precious name shall be called Counselor.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The mighty God, the everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace through all eternity. The mighty God, the everlasting Father, Jesus Immanuel, our Savior.{/lang-eng}
